name: Nova
title: Dominion Ghost
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Snipe
abilities.description: Deals 310 damage to the first enemy hit.

abilities.name: Pinning Shot
abilities.description: Deal 110 damage to an enemy and slow it by 40% for 2.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Holo Decoy
abilities.description: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds that appears to attack enemies. Using this Ability does not break Cloak.

heroics.name: Triple Tap
heroics.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 338 damage each.

heroics.name: Precision Strike
heroics.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.
